original: @188a * // yang 'jigs pa las sgrol bar 'dod pas /🔽gzungs 'di bris te gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags la grong ngam grong khyer ram skyes pa'am /
analyzed: @188a * // yang 'jigs pa las sgrol bar 'dod pas / gzungs 'di bris te gdugs sam rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags la grong ngam grong khyer ram skyes pa'am /
translated: Furthermore, if you wish to be liberated from fear,

original: bud med kyis mchod pa dang / bskor ba bya ste /
analyzed: bud med kyis mchod pa dang / bskor ba bya ste /
translated: write out this dhāraṇī, attach it to the top of a parasol or a victory banner, and have men and women make offerings and circumambulate it.

original: gsol ba btab nas tshangs pa la sogs pa la mchod pa dang gtor ma byin te /
analyzed: gsol ba btab nas tshangs pa la sogs pa la mchod pa dang gtor ma byin te /
translated: Make supplications, make offerings to Brahmā and so forth, and give tormas.🔽Recite this dhāraṇī one hundred or one thousand times, write it out, and attach it to your body or neck.

original: gzungs 'di brgya'am stong du bzlas brjod bya ba dang / bris te lus sam mgul du btags nas rtag tu 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can yid la byed pa dang gsol ba 'debs shing bzlas brjod byas na rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs ba la sogs ba dang /
analyzed: gzungs 'di brgya'am stong du bzlas brjod bya ba dang / bris te lus sam mgul du btags nas rtag tu 'phags ma gdugs dkar mo can yid la byed pa dang gsol ba 'debs shing bzlas brjod byas na rgyal po'i chad pas 'jigs ba la sogs ba dang /
translated: If you always keep noble Sitātapatrā in mind, make supplications, and recite the dhāraṇī, you will be protected from the fear of capital punishment and so forth,

original: lha'i gdon la sogs pa dang / mdangs za ba la sogs pa'i 'jigs ba dang / gdon thams cad kyis byas pa la sogs pa dang / nad dang rlung dang mkhris pa la sogs pa dang / gcan gzan sbrang bu tre ma la sogs pa las grol ba dang /
analyzed: lha'i gdon la sogs pa dang / mdangs za ba la sogs pa'i 'jigs ba dang / gdon thams cad kyis byas pa la sogs pa dang / nad dang rlung dang mkhris pa la sogs pa dang / gcan gzan sbrang bu tre ma la sogs pa las grol ba dang /
translated: fear of the god-demons and so forth, fear of the vitality-stealers and so forth, fear of all the demons and so forth, fear of disease, wind, bile, and so forth, fear of wild animals, bees, centipedes, and so forth,

original: rims nad thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rims nad thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and fear of all contagious diseases will be liberated.

original: 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: 'jigs pa las skyob pa'i thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The method of protecting from fear is complete.
